summary: You know that scene in Hook where Peter visits Wendy through the years and she grows up, and then older, and all of a sudden she...
body:
You know that scene in Hook where Peter visits Wendy through the years and she grows up, and then older, and all of a sudden she has a daughter, well I was imagining that for Carol, Maria and Monica - Carol visits them through the years, regularly at first, and everytime Monica rushes outside in the backyard, shouting with a big smile on her face “Auntie Carol!”, and everytime she’s changed a little bit and grown up, then she’s a teenager, then a young adult, but she never stops coming to the backyard to greet Carol with an enthusiastic “Auntie Carol!”

And then someday, when Carol visits, she’s greeted by a young child, about three, and she tilts her head, frowning curiously, and then we hear “where are you sweetie? I told you not to go in the backyard on your -” and a woman who Carol doesn’t recognize at first comes face to face with her. The woman’s shocked, at first, then her face lights up. “Hey Auntie Carol”

And as much as Monica is delighted to see Carol again, Maria on the other hand gives her the angry treatment. “Ten years. You couldn’t come back earlier, could you? I thought I had lost you again.” “I’m so sorry”, Carol says, genuinely. There’s a moment of silent, then Carol notices that the wall is covered with calendars. All the days are marked with a red cross. “What’s that?”, she asks. Maria can’t answer, still angry and pained, so Monica does: “All the days without you.”

Uugh, I went too far as usual. But I wonder how long Captain Marvel was gone.

And as much as Monica is delighted to see Carol again, Maria on the other hand gives her the angry treatment. “Ten years. You couldn’t come back earlier, could you? Uugh, I went too far as usual. But I wonder how long Captain Marvel was gone.

And then someday, when Carol visits, she’s greeted by a young child, about three, and she tilts her head, frowning curiously, and then we hear “where are you sweetie? I told you not to go in the backyard on your -” and a woman who Carol doesn’t recognize at first comes face to face with her. The woman’s shocked, at first, then her face lights up. “Hey Auntie Carol”

And as much as Monica is delighted to see Carol again, Maria on the other hand gives her the angry treatment. “Ten years. You couldn’t come back earlier, could you? I thought I had lost you again.” “I’m so sorry”, Carol says, genuinely. There’s a moment of silent, then Carol notices that the wall is covered with calendars. All the days are marked with a red cross. “What’s that?”, she asks. Maria can’t answer, still angry and pained, so Monica does: “All the days without you.”

Uugh, I went too far as usual. But I wonder how long Captain Marvel was gone.
trail.content:
You know that scene in Hook where Peter visits Wendy through the years and she grows up, and then older, and all of a sudden she has a daughter, well I was imagining that for Carol, Maria and Monica - Carol visits them through the years, regularly at first, and everytime Monica rushes outside in the backyard, shouting with a big smile on her face “Auntie Carol!”, and everytime she’s changed a little bit and grown up, then she’s a teenager, then a young adult, but she never stops coming to the backyard to greet Carol with an enthusiastic “Auntie Carol!”

And then someday, when Carol visits, she’s greeted by a young child, about three, and she tilts her head, frowning curiously, and then we hear “where are you sweetie? I told you not to go in the backyard on your -” and a woman who Carol doesn’t recognize at first comes face to face with her. The woman’s shocked, at first, then her face lights up. “Hey Auntie Carol”

And as much as Monica is delighted to see Carol again, Maria on the other hand gives her the angry treatment. “Ten years. You couldn’t come back earlier, could you? I thought I had lost you again.” “I’m so sorry”, Carol says, genuinely. There’s a moment of silent, then Carol notices that the wall is covered with calendars. summary:
So like, are people genuinely bitching that Brie Larson didn’t give a good performance in Captain Marvel?
Because, my dudes, I...
body:
So like, are people genuinely bitching that Brie Larson didn’t give a good performance in Captain Marvel?

Because, my dudes, I just watched that movie and she was subtle as shit; SHE ACTED THE WAY A REAL PERSON WOULD ACTUALLY BEHAVE, not how an actor would act a person behaving. And that, good buddies, is the best kind of acting there is.

Gimme that genuine subtlety all day long, thank you very much.

Also, she’s gonna fucking murder Thanos in a second. At least, we all know she can, even if the Russos make her do a bunch of dumb shit, which they probably will.

question: Is it weird that I think that Brie looks like Aloy (HZD) in those rainbow pictures!?  Especially the one in your icon?? Until I saw the entire photoshoot, I assumed that your icon was just Aloy fanart.
answer:
GASP!!

This is so great because Brie is a gamer!!

BRIE LARSON TO PLAY ALOY IN A LIVE-ACTION HZD NETFLIX SERIES PLS!!

(Also she does most of her own stunts now because she trains like a beast so it’s a plus!)

ask is always open, anon is always on. talk to me if you want to. about anything. i’d love to provide a friendly supportive ear.

.

.

.

i love eleven (jane hopper) and all things to do with her *waffle emoji* 💛

.

i also love villanelle so much 📝💉🔪🖤

.

.

currently: big little lies, jessica jones, fleabag, the handmaid’s tale, screaming at the tv during the women’s world cup, still obsessing over killing eve, excited for glow s3 and stranger things s3

.

.

loves: carol danvers, ww 1984, queen, synthwave, paramore, halsey, taylor swift, rachel maddow, aoc, stephen king, stranger things, glow, the umbrella academy, the oa, killing eve, broad city, big little lies, gentleman jack, game of thrones, westworld, the golden girls, the x-files, south park, letterkenny, seinfeld, aqua teen hunger force, lots more but i can’t think of them all...

.

ships: mileven, joncy, villaneve, hayley x lindsey (byrnes), debbie x lou, carol danvers x no one, carol danvers x maria rambeau, arya stark x no one, diana prince x no one

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

”a true friend stabs you in the front” - oscar wilde

blog.name: templeofgeek
blog.title: Temple of Geek
blog.description:
Need more geek in your life? Well then you are in the right place! We have a plethora of geek related posts to go around.

Click Here ->Temple of Geek Check us out

summary:
Carol Danvers a.k.a Captain Marvel is one badass superhero! So we totally get why you want to cosplay as her! 
 Captain Marvel...
body:
Carol Danvers a.k.a Captain Marvel is one badass superhero! So we totally get why you want to cosplay as her!

Captain Marvel is an extraterrestrial Kree warrior who finds herself caught in the middle of an intergalactic battle between her people and the Skrulls. Living on Earth in 1995, she keeps having recurring memories of another life as U.S. Air Force pilot Carol Danvers. She also has a badass friend named Maria Rambeau who is also an airforce pilot. In the movie Carol Danvers two distinct “Earth Cosplays”. She wears an airforce pilot uniform as well as a grunge style outfit featuring a S.H.I.E.L.D. hat and a white Nine Inch Nails T-Shirt.

This tutorial on Captain Marvel will provide reference photos, search terms to use for locating items and tips. We will try to provide you with as much information as we can so you can hunt down your own Captain Marvel cosplay.  We will provide links to certain items but keep in mind that they may sell out and no longer be available, or they may not be available to ship to all countries.

Grunge Carol Danvers/Captain Marvel

Grunge Look on Captain Marvel (Brie Larson) ©Marvel Studios 2019

This look is simple enough. The most recognizable pieces are the oversized men’s moto jacket, grey S.H.I.E.L.D. hat, and the White Nine Inch Nails band T-Shirt. There is a version of this T-Shirt on the Nine Inch Nails website, but it is not the screen accurate shirt. The one worn by Brie Larson may have been altered or custom made for her. It could also be a vintage Tee that is no longer available. The Nine Inch Nails Tshirt sold online is longer than the one worn by Larson.

LOGO WHITE TEE by Nine Inch Nails (Similar to the one worn by Captain Marvel)

Available at: https://store.nin.com/collections/clothing/products/white-logo-tee

We recommend buying from the artist website because we are all about supporting bands! But there are also other versions available on Etsy and other sites. Search terms to use are white & grey Nine Inch Nails shirt and Captain marvel NIN shirt.

New Nine Inch Nail NIN Rock Band CAPTAIN MARVEL Hero Men’s T-shirt by ShirtForWorld

NIN shirts on Redbubble

Captain Marvel T-Shirt Design by MeerKatz

There are a lot of versions of the grey S.h.I.E.L.D. hat found online. The search terms you want to use are Captain Marvel Shield Hat and Grey Shield Hat. We personally like the way the hat from EpitomeAparrel looks.

Available at: https://www.etsy.com/listing/660214612

The Officially Licensed hat from Lids is currently out of stock but may be available for resale on sites like eBay.

The jacket is the hardest piece of this cosplay. Based on filming reference photos from a deleted scene (see below) we know that she is wearing a men’s motorcycle jacket. It is a grey distressed motorcycle jacket with large front lapels, four zippered front pockets, and zippered sleeves. What we don’t know at this time is what brand and style it is. While researching this jacket we found websites claiming to have custom made replicas of the jacket, but they only showed movie promo photos of the jacket and no proof to what the replicas actually looked like. in an effort to avoid our readers be scammed, we have chosen not to link those sites. Our best recommendation is to search for a similar jacket in whatever way you can, be it Etsy, Amazon, thrift shops and more. We have provided reference photos below to help you with your search. but truly as long as you have the Hat and the Tshirt you could wear any jacket and still be recognizable as Captain Marvel!

phot by Just Jared
phot by Just Jared

Air Force Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers

Marvel Studios’ CAPTAIN MARVEL..L to R: Maria Rambeau (Lashana Lynch) and Captain Marvel (Brie Larson) ..Photo: Film Frame..©Marvel Studios 2019

This cosplay section works for both Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers. They essentially wear the exact same outfit. The only difference being their name tags. In the promo photo above Carol Danvers’ name is removed from the photo, but it is seen in the movie. They are both wearing US Airforce Flight Suits. You can find the flight suits at a military surplus store, Etsy, Amazon, eBay, and other online stores. The onscreen ones are vintage 1990s suits and have a spot for two patches on the front.

JusticeAndFreedom Vintage Flight Suit

This Vintage Flight suite available from Justice and Freedom on Etsy is probably the closest to what is actually worn on film. But you can find lots of similar suits. The differences are small.

Others places to find the flight suits online:

Olive Drab Military Air Force Style Flight Suit Coveralls by Army Universe

Propper CWU 27/P Nomex Flight Suits from Tactical Gear 

The name patches might be the trickiest to find. You would have to have someone custom make a Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers patch. Or you could create your own. Ideas on making your own would be using iron-on transfers or painting one to look like it. if you are interested in buying the patches most of them are available through the Vanguard website: https://www.vanguardmil.com/collections/air-force-patches.

Stitch Loft offers the Patch Set at: http://www.stitchsloft.com/loft/carol_danvers_patch_set/

AF Flight Test Center Patch. Not currently available online on its own. May have to be a custom made item. We have provided a high-resolution design of the image here, in case you want to turn it into an iron-on patch or attempt to recreate it yourself.

AF Systems Command Patch available at: https://www.militaryvetspx.com/

USAF Test Pilot School available at: https://www.flyboys.com/pf77-tps.html

Aviator sunglasses are the easiest and can be found anywhere from $0.99 to a few hundred dollars. You can find plenty of options on Amazon. We are especially a fan of the aviators from Diff Eyewear that offers the captain marvel insignia on them available here: https://www.diffeyewear.com/.

Do you have any Captain Marvel Cosplay Tips? See anything we missed? Let us know in the comments below!

Click the link to find out how To Cosplay Grunge & Air Force Captain Marvel! Carol Danvers a.k.a Captain Marvel is one badass superhero! So we totally get why you want to cosplay as her!

phot by Just Jared
phot by Just Jared

Air Force Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers

Marvel Studios’ CAPTAIN MARVEL..L to R: Maria Rambeau (Lashana Lynch) and Captain Marvel (Brie Larson) ..Photo: Film Frame..©Marvel Studios 2019

This cosplay section works for both Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers. They essentially wear the exact same outfit. The only difference being their name tags. In the promo photo above Carol Danvers’ name is removed from the photo, but it is seen in the movie. They are both wearing US Airforce Flight Suits. You can find the flight suits at a military surplus store, Etsy, Amazon, eBay, and other online stores. The onscreen ones are vintage 1990s suits and have a spot for two patches on the front.

JusticeAndFreedom Vintage Flight Suit

This Vintage Flight suite available from Justice and Freedom on Etsy is probably the closest to what is actually worn on film. But you can find lots of similar suits. The differences are small.

Others places to find the flight suits online:

Olive Drab Military Air Force Style Flight Suit Coveralls by Army Universe

Propper CWU 27/P Nomex Flight Suits from Tactical Gear 

The name patches might be the trickiest to find. You would have to have someone custom make a Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers patch. Or you could create your own. Ideas on making your own would be using iron-on transfers or painting one to look like it. if you are interested in buying the patches most of them are available through the Vanguard website: https://www.vanguardmil.com/collections/air-force-patches.

Stitch Loft offers the Patch Set at: http://www.stitchsloft.com/loft/carol_danvers_patch_set/

AF Flight Test Center Patch. Not currently available online on its own. May have to be a custom made item. We have provided a high-resolution design of the image here, in case you want to turn it into an iron-on patch or attempt to recreate it yourself.

AF Systems Command Patch available at: https://www.militaryvetspx.com/

USAF Test Pilot School available at: https://www.flyboys.com/pf77-tps.html

Aviator sunglasses are the easiest and can be found anywhere from $0.99 to a few hundred dollars. You can find plenty of options on Amazon. We are especially a fan of the aviators from Diff Eyewear that offers the captain marvel insignia on them available here: https://www.diffeyewear.com/.

Do you have any Captain Marvel Cosplay Tips? See anything we missed? Let us know in the comments below!

Click the link to find out how To Cosplay Grunge & Air Force Captain Marvel! Carol Danvers a.k.a Captain Marvel is one badass superhero! So we totally get why you want to cosplay as her!

trail.content_raw:
Carol Danvers a.k.a Captain Marvel is one badass superhero! So we totally get why you want to cosplay as her!

Captain Marvel is an extraterrestrial Kree warrior who finds herself caught in the middle of an intergalactic battle between her people and the Skrulls. Living on Earth in 1995, she keeps having recurring memories of another life as U.S. Air Force pilot Carol Danvers. She also has a badass friend named Maria Rambeau who is also an airforce pilot. In the movie Carol Danvers two distinct “Earth Cosplays”. She wears an airforce pilot uniform as well as a grunge style outfit featuring a S.H.I.E.L.D. hat and a white Nine Inch Nails T-Shirt.

This tutorial on Captain Marvel will provide reference photos, search terms to use for locating items and tips. We will try to provide you with as much information as we can so you can hunt down your own Captain Marvel cosplay.  We will provide links to certain items but keep in mind that they may sell out and no longer be available, or they may not be available to ship to all countries.

Grunge Carol Danvers/Captain Marvel

Grunge Look on Captain Marvel (Brie Larson) ©Marvel Studios 2019

This look is simple enough. The most recognizable pieces are the oversized men’s moto jacket, grey S.H.I.E.L.D. hat, and the White Nine Inch Nails band T-Shirt. There is a version of this T-Shirt on the Nine Inch Nails website, but it is not the screen accurate shirt. The one worn by Brie Larson may have been altered or custom made for her. It could also be a vintage Tee that is no longer available. The Nine Inch Nails Tshirt sold online is longer than the one worn by Larson.

LOGO WHITE TEE by Nine Inch Nails (Similar to the one worn by Captain Marvel)

Available at: https://store.nin.com/collections/clothing/products/white-logo-tee

We recommend buying from the artist website because we are all about supporting bands! But there are also other versions available on Etsy and other sites. Search terms to use are white & grey Nine Inch Nails shirt and Captain marvel NIN shirt.

New Nine Inch Nail NIN Rock Band CAPTAIN MARVEL Hero Men’s T-shirt by ShirtForWorld

NIN shirts on Redbubble

Captain Marvel T-Shirt Design by MeerKatz

There are a lot of versions of the grey S.h.I.E.L.D. hat found online. The search terms you want to use are Captain Marvel Shield Hat and Grey Shield Hat. We personally like the way the hat from EpitomeAparrel looks.

Available at: https://www.etsy.com/listing/660214612

The Officially Licensed hat from Lids is currently out of stock but may be available for resale on sites like eBay.

The jacket is the hardest piece of this cosplay. Based on filming reference photos from a deleted scene (see below) we know that she is wearing a men’s motorcycle jacket. It is a grey distressed motorcycle jacket with large front lapels, four zippered front pockets, and zippered sleeves. What we don’t know at this time is what brand and style it is. While researching this jacket we found websites claiming to have custom made replicas of the jacket, but they only showed movie promo photos of the jacket and no proof to what the replicas actually looked like. in an effort to avoid our readers be scammed, we have chosen not to link those sites. Our best recommendation is to search for a similar jacket in whatever way you can, be it Etsy, Amazon, thrift shops and more. We have provided reference photos below to help you with your search. but truly as long as you have the Hat and the Tshirt you could wear any jacket and still be recognizable as Captain Marvel!

phot by Just Jared
phot by Just Jared

Air Force Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers

Marvel Studios’ CAPTAIN MARVEL..L to R: Maria Rambeau (Lashana Lynch) and Captain Marvel (Brie Larson) ..Photo: Film Frame..©Marvel Studios 2019

This cosplay section works for both Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers. They essentially wear the exact same outfit. The only difference being their name tags. In the promo photo above Carol Danvers’ name is removed from the photo, but it is seen in the movie. They are both wearing US Airforce Flight Suits. You can find the flight suits at a military surplus store, Etsy, Amazon, eBay, and other online stores. The onscreen ones are vintage 1990s suits and have a spot for two patches on the front.

JusticeAndFreedom Vintage Flight Suit

This Vintage Flight suite available from Justice and Freedom on Etsy is probably the closest to what is actually worn on film. But you can find lots of similar suits. The differences are small.

Others places to find the flight suits online:

Olive Drab Military Air Force Style Flight Suit Coveralls by Army Universe

Propper CWU 27/P Nomex Flight Suits from Tactical Gear 

The name patches might be the trickiest to find. You would have to have someone custom make a Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers patch. Or you could create your own. Ideas on making your own would be using iron-on transfers or painting one to look like it. if you are interested in buying the patches most of them are available through the Vanguard website: https://www.vanguardmil.com/collections/air-force-patches.

Stitch Loft offers the Patch Set at: http://www.stitchsloft.com/loft/carol_danvers_patch_set/

AF Flight Test Center Patch. Not currently available online on its own. May have to be a custom made item. We have provided a high-resolution design of the image here, in case you want to turn it into an iron-on patch or attempt to recreate it yourself.

AF Systems Command Patch available at: https://www.militaryvetspx.com/

USAF Test Pilot School available at: https://www.flyboys.com/pf77-tps.html

Aviator sunglasses are the easiest and can be found anywhere from $0.99 to a few hundred dollars. You can find plenty of options on Amazon. We are especially a fan of the aviators from Diff Eyewear that offers the captain marvel insignia on them available here: https://www.diffeyewear.com/.

Do you have any Captain Marvel Cosplay Tips? See anything we missed? Let us know in the comments below!

Click the link to find out how To Cosplay Grunge & Air Force Captain Marvel! Carol Danvers a.k.a Captain Marvel is one badass superhero! So we totally get why you want to cosplay as her!

summary: idk why i’m so protective of captain marvel bc i haven’t even seen the movie yet but honestly it’s important to me, a marvel...
body: idk why i’m so protective of captain marvel bc i haven’t even seen the movie yet but honestly it’s important to me, a marvel movie about a woman who isn’t sexualized. she wears a full body suit. she’s not the most gorgeous woman i’ve ever seen but she’s strong and she exists without being a side character or a love interest for a male superhero. that’s what i want to be. she lives outside the world of male domination and doesn’t take shit. i will defend her to the grave, because i’m defending the best version of me.

reblog.comment: idk why i’m so protective of captain marvel bc i haven’t even seen the movie yet but honestly it’s important to me, a marvel movie about a woman who isn’t sexualized. she wears a full body suit. she’s not the most gorgeous woman i’ve ever seen but she’s strong and she exists without being a side character or a love interest for a male superhero. that’s what i want to be. she lives outside the world of male domination and doesn’t take shit. i will defend her to the grave, because i’m defending the best version of me.

blog.name: jthegayy
blog.title: J The Gay
blog.description: Yes you can call me J and yes I'm Gay

summary:
The Marvel(ous ;)) Brie Larson!
Captain Marvel has entered this list as well yes. I will admit that i didn't know who she was ...
body:
Women that put the Gay to the J Part 5:

The Marvel(ous ;)) Brie Larson!

Captain Marvel has entered this list as well yes. I will admit that i didn’t know who she was before the latest Marvel movie “Captain Marvel” but it doesn’t change the fact that i have grown to like her.

Brie is an activist, a superb actor and a super funny gal. I mean for real look up her friendship with Samuel L. Jackson, they are goalllsss.

She is beautiful if you haven’t noticed and i for one am all in for a female lead superhero movie.

You look lovely darling

S a m e Chris totally s a m e e e

Bonus:

She looks absolutely lovely in our colors
